Function reference

All functions

add_vaf()
Adding the VAF dataset to the current object.
filter_dataset()
Filters the input dataset.
fit()
Creates an object of class mvnmm.
get_dataframe()
Retrieve the object dataframe.
get_vaf_dataframe()
Retrieve the object VAF dataframe.
get_viber_clusters()
Retrieve the unique labels of mutation clusters, given the coverage labels.
plot(<mvnmm>)
2D scatter and density plot
plot_exp_fit()
Exponential fitting
plot_exp_rate()
Exponential rate
plot_marginal()
Histogram of the marginal distribution of each dimension
plot_mullerplot()
Muller plot
plot_scatter_density()
2D scatterplot and density
plot_vaf()
VAF scatterplot
print(<mvnmm>)
Print method
run_viber()
Functions to run VIBER for mutations clustering
